categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Battle of Tarawa  was a battle fought early during the Galactic Civil War at Tarawa, between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire. General Jan Dodonna managed to destroy a fleet of Star Destroyers with Y-wing starfighters.
The Battle of Tarawa shares its name with the real-world Battle of Tarawa, a major American offensive during World War II.
